visualizerParams.title: Web Refactor: Expanding Cards
visualizerParams.problemDescription: Clean up the card expansion logic by refactoring the removal of 'active' classes into a separate, reusable function.
visualizerParams.initialCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <script>
    panels.forEach(panel => {
      panel.addEventListener('click', () => {
        // Inline removal logic
        panels.forEach(p => p.classList.remove('active'));
        panel.classList.add('active');
      });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>

solution.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <script>
    const removeActive = () => panels.forEach(p => p.classList.remove('active'));

    panels.forEach(panel => {
      panel.addEventListener('click', () => {
        removeActive();
        panel.classList.add('active');
      });
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>
solution.explanation: Extracting repetitive logic into a named function (DRY) makes the code more modular and easier to read.
